mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rand, McNally & Co.'s Georgia
Georgia
Rand, McNally & Co.'s New business atlas map of Georgia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rand McNally and Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rand, McNally & Co., Map Publishers and Engravers
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Alternative title printed below scale: Rand, McNally & Co.'s New business atlas map of Georgia. Copyright 1895, by Rnd, McNally & Co.
List of railroads overprinted in red at upper right, with routes identified by number.
Includes index of chief cities printed in the left margin and an index of counties, creeks, islands, rivers and towns on verso.
Shows outline details of bordering counties in adjoining states.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: linen-backing obscures text on verso.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Railroads--Georgia--Maps.
Transportation--Georgia--Maps.
Georgia--Maps.
